1468555187799441408.tweet: Two almost invisible beauties for today's #WormWednesday; Tomopteris sp. from outside of Bergen, Norway. These are marine planktonic #polychaete worms, and known to have impressive yellow bioluminescent mucus!  https://t.co/kB0pt4hnSg
